scope.description: Test worker launcher - Create a simple test file to verify worker launching works

task_data.title: Test Worker Launcher Fix
task_data.description:
This is a test task to verify the worker launcher fix works correctly. Your job is to:

1. Confirm you can read this worker spec file
2. Create a simple test file at tests/worker-launcher-test.txt
3. Add content: 'Worker launcher test completed successfully at [timestamp]'
4. Commit with message: 'test: verify worker launcher fix'
5. Report back that you successfully read your spec and completed the task

This is a simple task to verify the architecture fix is working.
